author: feren
name: Ambiance Minty
description:
It's an Ambiance like theme variant of the Minty Theme in orange, that was removed from Spices because of lack of Cinnamon 3.2 Compatiblity, that this version fixes.

This theme has been tested to work on Cinnamon 3.2. Since this theme was deleted, I don't remember who made the original, sadly, so if you want me to credit you and you're the creator of the original, be sure to open up an issue and tag me.
